lead_paragraph: The Minnesota Lynx will play the final two games without its top two scorers, Seimone Augustus and Candice Wiggins, who have been shut down because of injuries sustained in Tuesday night’s game against Indiana.
snippet: The Minnesota Lynx will play the final two games without its top two scorers, Seimone Augustus and Candice Wiggins, who have been shut down because of injuries sustained in Tuesday night’s game against Indiana.
